posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 35663480', 'Rent: $3,000 / Month', 'Beds: 2', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Parking:: no parking', 'WE HAVE THE LARGEST EXCLUSIVE RENTAL INVENTORY IN THE NORTH END.', 'Core Property Group – 278 North Street Boston, MA 02113 - Open 7 Days a Week', 'MONEY DUE UP FRONT', 'FIRST MONTH: $3000', 'SECURITY DEPOSIT:  $3000', 'BROKER FEE: $3000', 'NORTH END', '$3000', '9/1/2022', 'GARDEN LEVEL APARTMENT IN VERY NICE BUILDING', '1000 SQUARE FEET', 'RENOVATED IN 2017', 'DOWNTOWN TWO BEDROOM', 'Over-sized Two Bedroom with EXTRA STORAGE', 'Huge Bedrooms', 'Huge Living Room', 'Very Nice Building', 'Exposed Brick', 'EXTRA STORAGE ROOM IN APT!!!', 'CENTRAL AIR', 'LAUNDRY', 'STORAGE ROOM BIG ENOUGH FOR BIKES, HOCKEY BAGS, GOLF CLUBS, LUGGAGE, AND MORE!!!!', '.', 'SALES...', 'Thinking of Buying or Selling??', 'Call today and LETS TALK.', ' I handle Condo & Multi Family Sales throughout the Downtown Boston Area.', '.', 'I mainly cover the North End, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, Downtown/Fidi, Seaport, South Boston, Charlestown & West End.', '.', 'Please contact Zach to Discuss ALL AVAILABILITY including OFF MARKET LISTINGS.', 'Please Call, Text, Email, or DM', 'Zach Barron', 'Core Property Group', 'Vice President', '617-939-1078', 'Instagram: @real_estate_barron', 'zbarron <URL>', '*** BROKERS:', 'THIS LISTING IS NOT A CO-BROKE ***', 'All Information should be verified.', 'The apartments advertised may be rented.', 'Core Property Group is an "Equal Housing Opportunity" Real Estate Company.']
